question: 私立大学
sourceMnemonic: You've seen <ja>私立</ja>, which is "private," and you've seen <ja>大学</ja>, which is "college" or "university." So, combine them together and you have a <vocabulary>private college</vocabulary> / <vocabulary>private university</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: If you know the readings of the words <ja>私立</ja> and <ja>大学</ja> you'll be able to read this. It's also all jukugo on'yomi readings too, so you can read it that way.
